website_summaries.verdict: A terrific putting mat that novice and expert golfers alike are sure to enjoy.
pros: PET resin construction delivers outstanding strength and durability
Includes built-in sand traps that enable you to put your golf skills to the test
Kidney-shaped mat replicates a real world putting green
Mat surface is designed to stay smooth for an extended period of time
cons: Plastic holes are cheap and flimsy, and golf balls won't always stay in the holes

customer_reviews.title: Great mat, arrived slightly wrinkled. Quality overall!
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding putting mat, especially for the price. As us golfers know, putting typically makes up roughly 40% of all shots, so every stroke gained counts. This mat is high quality, runs well, and has a sticky backing so it doesn't slide around on my tile floors. I love practicing my 5-9 foot putts as these can be VERY costly on the course. The only reason I rate this a 4/5 is because mine came a bit wrinkled on the top left side. Assuming yours is received without wrinkles it would be a perfect 5/5. Thank you for reading and rating my review!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon SteveTop Contributor: Golf

customer_reviews.title: ( It did however arrive looking like the picture
customer_reviews.text: A gift for my husband who is a golfer. He tried it out but didn't care enough for it to use it again. :( It did however arrive looking like the picture. It re-markedly held it's shape and did not rumple up once it was unboxed. It would be great for a kid or someone just starting out as a golfer or who needs putting practice but I'm afraid it becomes boring for a more advanced golfer.
customer_reviews.author: sara

customer_reviews.title: Seems nice, but no case...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a git for my nephew, the mat itself looks great, however, it just comes in the shipping box, there's no item packaging or case. So storage will seem to be an issue. You can try to reuse a the shipping box, but that isn't super convenient, nor does it look very attractive sitting in your house in a used cardboard box. I ordered a yoga carrying sling in hopes that it will allow him to roll it up and keep it out of the way in a nice(er) way.
customer_reviews.author: photoq237

customer_reviews.title: Good for working on putts from 2-7ft
customer_reviews.text: The mat does measure 9 feet in total length, though the longest putt possible is about 7.5ft from the center hole. Surface is smooth and consistent, rolls true, and reasonably quick on top of a wood floor. The foot or so of the mat with the holes slopes slightly upward making it difficult to practice putts inside of about 2 feet. The mat rolls up easily and fits in the corner of a closet. Great for practicing away from the course.
customer_reviews.author: Todd

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Quality - Buyer Beware
customer_reviews.text: In a few words, this item is a piece of junk. I received the item and the green and foam were separated along a foot long length of the side. On the other end of the green, the item was wrinkled and creased. The box it came in was also undersized and probably contributed to the damage.
customer_reviews.author: MF

customer_reviews.title: Better than the 80's and 90's models.
customer_reviews.text: I like it. The grip keeps it flat and secure against a smooth floor--like linoluem or wood--but doesn't offer much resistance against cracks/bumps under it. I don't like it on carpet, as there is certainly some sinkage that slows down the ball a good deal. The foam insert is giving more of a bump than slope, which isn't so nice to practice appropriate speed. So while I like it as a feature of my office to give me some kinesthetic stress relief, I wouldn't use it as a reliable practice mat.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Fields

customer_reviews.title: Amazing and Inexpensive Putting Solution with a Few Minor Issues..
customer_reviews.text: This product is excellent for practing short-distance putting on varying surfaces. The felt may be rolled into a cylinder for convenient storage when not in use. After playing with this item for few hours, a few issues were noticeable. This item is intended for solid-surfaces, yet certian Golf Balls will not function properly with this product at times. Firm Golf Balls will tend to leave the putting hole with contact of a solid-surface. However, this issue may be resolved when used on certain-types of carpets. Unfortantely, the product tends to produce minor wrinkles when used on non-solid surfaces that may affect the accuracy and magnitude of your putt.
customer_reviews.author: Lana

customer_reviews.title: Good for teaching the basics of putting and maybe making ...
customer_reviews.text: It's just a very cheap piece of felt with some foam toward the end / ramp to have holes to putt into. Id say putting on this is moderate to the slower side if place on a wood floor. Good for teaching the basics of putting and maybe making sure you are actually putting straight. I did well putting on my next round, maybe due to this product, maybe not. 3 starts because there really isn't much to it and the foam on the end is fairly cheap. It tends to have 'memory' from being wrapped up so care must be taken not to wrap too tightly or more importantly unevenly.
customer_reviews.author: Grumpy Dad

customer_reviews.title: Expected a bit better quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift. It’s ok...nothing special though. Cons: -There were scraps hanging off where the holes had been cut, so it looked pretty sloppy. -The elevated foam part is kind of uneven (think warped pool table) so many of the putts take strange sideways turns in ways that would rarely happen on a real green. Pros: -Non-slip bottom is a nice touch & works well -“Grass” is soft and feels somewhat natural Final thoughts: probably wouldn’t purchase again as a gift. For almost $40, I expected a bit more. But all in all, it’s a good basic practice putting green.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: Simple idea and product that actual works.
customer_reviews.text: Looking for something simple and that actual does what it is suppose to in a putting green for inside ones home.Purchased this for my mother on working her putting stroke. She has it on her wood floor and used with her other putting tools is getting the need help she needs in her putting stroke. The advantage of this is she does not have to go to the country club, range, etc. ...or outside in the summer heat. The surface of the putting green is great and one has actual holes to aim at to judge ones speed and aim.
customer_reviews.author: Simple Bubba

customer_reviews.title: Works for me.
customer_reviews.text: I like it. Some have mentioned a slight "bump" which it does have near the hole side, but this is minor in my view. I like that it has a bit of "break" when going for the center hole. Grandsons had fun trying to compete with each other. I think you can get a feel for touch and direction, which is what putting is mostly about. It is not meant to be a replacement for the greens at your favorite course, just something you can do in your home with little effort.
customer_reviews.author: MnBoy

customer_reviews.title: Could be better...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a Christmas gift for my dad. Overall it's a great product and he certainly uses it daily. My only gripe is that it arrived haphazardly tossed into a box and the fabric was marred with wrinkles and creases. It took about a week for it to flatten out enough for it to be usuable.
customer_reviews.author: MissReadsALot

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the price!!
customer_reviews.text: Love the look of this and the price point. Wanted a fun gift for my husband for his birthday that wouldn’t break the bank but that he would enjoy. He has used this almost daily. Very compact. Does not look cheap. Overall, I am very happy with it. I almost purchased a more expensive green because I was convinced this one would not be as nice because of the price point, but I am so glad that I got this one. Just what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly S

customer_reviews.title: Glue peeled away
customer_reviews.text: I was pretty happy with this putting green at first but the more I used it the material by the cups peeled away from the mat making it useless. The glue that holds it doesn’t seem very strong
customer_reviews.author: Jason Robert Sage

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: It is very good and cute for a putting green for less than $40! It is delivered in a long-box as rolled up like yogamat (wrinkles free). It is light but stays well on my carpet. Fun way to spend my time with my favorite sports.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Kim

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: I really have enjoyed practicing my putting on this mat. I read a few of the bad reviews and had concerns. But no wonder there are so many positive reviews as this is great practice mat. I laid flat from the get go and lays flat every time I unroll it to practice on. Ball rolls true. Very impressed and have had a lot of fun. Taking it to a party this weekend to share with my friends who also love to play golf.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: I love it!  He loves it. Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband. He said this is the best Christmas ever! He is a golfer and loves this putting green! I’m not much of a golfer and I putt on it. So far I have hit 8 in hole and missed the same. He only has 6. The competition continues. The mat lays flat the grassy feel is soft to the touch. There is about a 1” incline which keeps you on your game. This is great to practice. I even spotted how he is putting and helped correct the swing of the club.
customer_reviews.author: Save the children

customer_reviews.title: Putting Green
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd purchase for a Putt-A-bout. Husband has one, and we use this to practice when we can't get out to the course/during the winter months. Bought this as a gift for our grandson who is just learning golf. He loves practicing on Grandpa's mat whenever he comes over and would really like to have one for himself. Great value. Works great for practice putting.
customer_reviews.author: CK

customer_reviews.title: 15 yr old nephew loves it
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a Christmas present for my 15 yr old nephew that is obsessed with golf (and on the golf team at school). He uses this mat almost daily to practice indoors. It wasn't completely wrinkle free and definitely better used on a hard wood floor (instead of carpet), but he's even used it on carpet and it's not bad! I'm very happy with this purchase and that he gets a lot of use out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Great putting green!
customer_reviews.text: I love this putting green. I haven't had any wrinkles show up and it acts like a real green in terms of ball speed. The slope at the end is also a nice touch, as are the ball traps for when you miss the hole. My dog even had an accident on it and it cleaned up perfectly without any issues. Definitely would recommend for the golfer in your life, or for yourself!
customer_reviews.author: Johnathan Montgomery

customer_reviews.title: Quality not the best
customer_reviews.text: It's ok. First, the under side looks like rubber in pictures. It is cheap foamand the adhesive isn't strong enough. Out of the box the bottom layer is already separating from the top layer. It's basically indoor/outdoor carpet on top of the foam you install with window a/c units, elmers glued together with a few holes in it. It's ok but shouldn't be more than $25 to get a better review.
customer_reviews.author: bcannon

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I'm really enjoying this practice green. It laid out flat immediately out of the box. With the three holes and wide starting area you can work multiple combination of putts. Also move it from carpet to hardwood to get different speeds. I wasn't sure about the "sand traps" in the back when I ordered it but they're actually great. They collect any misses so you're not chasing balls around the house. Great practice while watching the ball game.
customer_reviews.author: R Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Husband say it’s great
customer_reviews.text: My husband absolutely was impressed by this thought it was at least a $90-$120 and he knows more about golf than I. It was an unexpected Christmas gift and boy has he had a great time with he’s taken it with him to his family and friends houses for quick games so it’s easily portable. He states it high quality and love the padding.
customer_reviews.author: Desi Barton

customer_reviews.title: Awesome practice tool
customer_reviews.text: Best putting green for the money. Out of the box I unrolled it and no wrinkles. It roles true and is about the speed of normal public courses. The only down fall is the depth of the cups. If the ball speed isn’t perfect the ball rolls out of the hole. Not a big deal but some puts that are no good on this green would be in real golf. All in all I definitely recommend this green. Rolls up easily for storage. If you keep the box it will slide back in no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Zach

customer_reviews.title: Nice item!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this item. I used it on carpeting. You can even add a rolled up towel partway down to create a contour for more difficult putts.
customer_reviews.author: Fishing Guy

customer_reviews.title: Fun indoors to practicee putting
customer_reviews.text: This item has no negative aspects to me. It is fun to use to practice indoor putting. My wife and I made a game out of it and developed our putting skills regarding aim and force used for putting. It has a slight uphill at the end near the holes which requires the putter to accommodate for in the put. It doesn't lay perfectly flat over our plush style carpet which only adds to the skills required to make the put. Not bad for the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald J. Estvander

customer_reviews.title: Good dimensions and weight for indoors
customer_reviews.text: Good dimensions and weight for all ages & skill levels to use regularly. Ordered, spring 2020, as an indoor activity to keep family and elderly dad active. Design, with incline, multi-holes and sand traps, provides good platform for games and challenges for 1, 2 or all. "Would buy again!"
customer_reviews.author: Molly Brown

customer_reviews.title: Fun the first few times
customer_reviews.text: Got this because I wanted to really refine my short game, which this thing can help do. Using it indoors is fun for the first few times, but it gets kind of boring and repetitive when you figure out how the green plays. The redeeming factor of this is that it is very versatile to use. I have found that it works well with irons to improve approaching skills, obviously on carpets and not hardwood.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Sabak

customer_reviews.title: Super Slow
customer_reviews.text: Felt was super slow and unrealistic. Maybe if you're putting on a fairway...
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: Can be used at any age to practice putting
customer_reviews.text: Gave this to our 6-year old grandson along with a junior putter to practice putting in his house & he loved it! He loves to play putt-putt, so we thought it might be time to get him started on basics for the real game of golf. He spent hours at our house using this practice green, & it was plenty wide to allow him some leeway, as well as catch the missed hole-in-ones in the fake "sand traps." It really did help improve his putting, & we all had fun taking turns with it.
customer_reviews.author: mountain girl

customer_reviews.title: Great to improve your putting game
customer_reviews.text: Perfect putting greens. Pros: + lays flat even after storing rolled up + has a nice little incline for increased difficulty + the greens is nice quality similar to actual greens Cons: - Pretty large, so not ideal if you don’t have a decent space for it.
customer_reviews.author: Jamison Gilmore

customer_reviews.title: Best Putting Mat!
customer_reviews.text: Great putting mat! I bought this because I needed to work on my short game. I'm always worried with these kind of things because they usually end up being junk. But this one is amazing. I love the elevation with the foam and the nice curve. It works very well because I can putt with any angle. Would really recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Go Mom Go

customer_reviews.title: Very nice product
customer_reviews.text: This is not plastic grass thank goodness. It is a very low pile carpet with a thin but nicely weighted rubber backing that lays flat out of the box. NO RIPPLES! The end where the cups are is backed with normal gray foam to raise it up slightly and give the cup some depth. You can stand on or off it too. Great practice mat for the money, you won't regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Bob T

customer_reviews.title: great practice green
customer_reviews.text: I bought this practice putting for my dad for his 80th birthday. he absolutely loves it. now he can practice at home on the three days a week he is not on the golf course! this is an impressive product for the price. coming from a former PGA professional, I was surprised at how nicely the green unrolled flatly onto the floor. The roll of the ball on the green is also true and quick, and since it lays flat right out of the box, the ball rolls on the line you putt it on. also bought one for myself... this picture is right out of the box...nice. you wont be disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really cool gift
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my dad and it is a ton of fun to mess around with. Ball rolls very true, stays flat and doesn't get all wrinkled up even when rolled for storage. Definitely a cool gift for a golf lover.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Perfect to practice at home with putting videos.
customer_reviews.text: This + putting Youtube videos has reduced my putting strokes. You’ll look silly watching those tutorial videos at the course and its also hard to remember everything. This is the perfect way to practice them while watching them at home. Its a nice surface and has a nice feel. Hopefully it lasts long, but even it it doesnt It was worth the cost to lower a few strokes already.
customer_reviews.author: Scooba

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Purchased a more expensive mat for our granddaughter but this is a clone of that one and much cheaper. Rolls out flat, no wrinkles. The cups are shallow so on a concrete floor I place a towel underneath so the ball doesn’t bounce out. True roll with good speed. As a golf coach and First Tee volunteer, this product is an excellent choice. The rubber back keeps it from sliding so it’s stable if you walk on it.
customer_reviews.author: Dan M

customer_reviews.title: More realistic putting green ever
customer_reviews.text: I use to own the type where its just a narrow sheet with a hole ontop and it kicks the ball back, those are too easy and a waste of time. This one is wide and has slope angles in different areas , but mainly because its wide it makes it so much harder to get the ball in which is perfect, just like putting in real life.
customer_reviews.author: jon

customer_reviews.title: Buy this not the Shaun Webb
customer_reviews.text: I Purchased the Sean web putting mat which is almost identical but twice as expensive. It didn’t lay flat after three days. I promptly returned it and ordered this one and I am much happier with it and would recommend it to anyone looking or debating between the two.
customer_reviews.author: jason

customer_reviews.title: Most awesome; hours of entertainment
customer_reviews.text: Most awesome; hours of entertainment, an improved putting game, and yet not five stars... Much like this review you have to pay attention to the details. Noting that the mat is just that and there are no cup backs to the item as sold leaving something to be desired. None the less a solid primeday purchase and I mean play it as it lies rule number 76 no excuses play like a champ.
customer_reviews.author: Sammy B.

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: Nice and smoothly surface. Not odder when I opened the box. It’s also bigger than I expected! 4 stars instead of 5 is because the cushion underneath the rough and holes is the same height, so it’s a bump when the ball goes up. It will be nicer if they do an increasing height of slope instead. Only being a picky customer!
customer_reviews.author: Bean

customer_reviews.title: Great putting practice!
customer_reviews.text: This unrolled perfectly, no wrinkles or bumps. Rolled back up very easily & smoothly. Lightweight and all one piece. Enjoy the foam backing that creates the holes & "mini bunkers". Gives a fun challenge rather than putting on a completely flat surface. Easy to set up & put away & seems durable. Glad I bought it for practicing our putting when we can't get to the course.
customer_reviews.author: SBAZ

customer_reviews.title: Fun gift, good for practice
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my boyfriend as he was trying to better his golf game, and putting was his weakness. He set it up in his "man cave" and loves to have friendly competitions with his friends. He probably does that more often than actual practice, but at least he's enjoying it! The incline and the different placement of the holes and "traps" is great.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Good for the amateur golfer
customer_reviews.text: We live in cold weather where my husband cannot practice outside for at least a couple of months. He is a scratch golfer and wanted something much larger for our basement. The "turf" is okay and it does roll flat very nicely. I wouldn't purchase again for him, but this would be great for most golf lovers out there.
customer_reviews.author: K Corey

customer_reviews.title: Good surface
customer_reviews.text: We've had this putting green for approximately 6 months and ordered another one for nephew. The surface lays flat and seems pretty true putting. Love that we can move around easily from room to room, and leave out all year ! A great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Blue

customer_reviews.title: Practice makes perfect
customer_reviews.text: It's magic! After using this for a week, my husband finally hit a real putt in couples league!🤣 All joking aside, the whole family has loved practicing on this. Great quality and a great price. It had a crease on the end when we got it out the first time, but over a course of a few days it flattened back out. No biggie! (We also kept the box to store it)
customer_reviews.author: Eric W Bishop

customer_reviews.title: Yes please!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my daughter in law for Christmas! She loves it. She said she had a great night sleep. The weight was perfect and she was not hot at all. The color is beautiful! It comes in very nice storage packaging. I am so glad I order this product for her. Great price , great quality. Only wish i had order the grey one for my husband to try!
customer_reviews.author: Mommer Mia & Papa Ray

customer_reviews.title: Makes a great gift!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a Christmas gift for my 16-year-old granddaughter, who loves to golf. She was thrilled when she opened this gift! It's very well made, rolls up easily for storage, and I imagine it will last for many years.
customer_reviews.author: J. Hancock

customer_reviews.title: Very big !
customer_reviews.text: Father loves it so far, it's pretty solid. Dogs tend to like rolling themselves on it... It's pretty big ! Like takes as much room as a couch, so make sure you know where you're going to be putting it.
customer_reviews.author: dc.arock

customer_reviews.title: Contrary to some reviews, mine works great!
customer_reviews.text: I looked at buying this putting green and a few others like it on Amazon. I read the reviews on this green and saw that some people's would not lay flat so I became really skeptical and thought, "I'll just order it, and if it doesn't lay flat, then I'll just return it and get my refund." I was pleasantly surpised at how perfectly flat it layed right out of the box. I can't speak for other's experiences, but mine came in perfect and it works perfect and I really love it already. I have putt on it every single since I recieved it!
customer_reviews.author: Tristan Conrad

customer_reviews.title: Make a fun indoor putt-putt
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for the living room and transportable around the house. You can even putt onto the green from any direction adding levels of challenge as you see fit. Materials starting to fray a bit around the holes after hours of use since Christmas, but holding up well. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Doug F

customer_reviews.title: Fun little putting green
customer_reviews.text: This is a cool letting putting green. The carpet is soft and uniform. There is a foam ramp section on the last three feet which allows the holes or cups to be about a half inch up to a full inch off the ground. The green putting surface is soft and uniform fairly similar to a good golf green. I gave it four stars because the front two holes are only 1/2 inch deep and the golf ball will skip right over the hole if you hit the hole with any speed at all. The center hole in the back is 1 inch deep so the ball will be stopped in the cup.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Grandson loves this putting green
customer_reviews.text: Grandson loves to practice his mini golf putting on this portable putting green. He even builds obstacles and bumpers to make it more challenging and fun. Easy to roll up and store.
customer_reviews.author: JRMIAMI

customer_reviews.title: This item is great. My dad loved this and uses it all ...
customer_reviews.text: This item is great. My dad loved this and uses it all the time. It's heavy enough that it lays flat and doesn't curl up. I also bought the practice hole cup for him to set on this as well and it's awesome. It's great quality and would high recommend for those who believe golf season never ends
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: One of the best putting greens available, and the price is right.
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best putting greens available. I practice on this every week and it has absolutely made me a much better putter. My driveway has a slight grade which allows me to lay this putting green on any angle I choose so that I can practice shots that role right to left, up or down. Absolutely a must if you want to improve your putting.
customer_reviews.author: C. Angleberger

customer_reviews.title: Works for me!
customer_reviews.text: It’s lightweight, easy to roll up and move from room to room. The golf ball rolls smoothly. The space is wide and long enough to putt from different angles. Very good for practice.
customer_reviews.author: iShopper

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't really hold the balls.
customer_reviews.text: The two side holes are very shallow and the balls tend to go right through unless you hit them the perfect 'die at the hole' speed. Still not sure if this is bad or good.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Drager

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Very nice feel of the "green" and it was rolled up nice and tight but rolled out flat instantly the moment i rolled it out in my office. Flawless product. P.S. The holes are pretty shallow and the "sand traps" in the back are hollow in the bottom and don't look like sand traps as in the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Jae Yun Lee

customer_reviews.title: Great little practice green.
customer_reviews.text: I'm just learning about golf and wanted something to do to pass the time. This pad is perfect for putting. The grass could be more realistic, it does what it's designed to do. My cat thinks it's real because she always lays on it when I'm putting. I really am satisfied. It was well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Sgreen_94303

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Putting Green for the money
customer_reviews.text: I love this putting green. On my polished concrete floors it is very fast and on tight pile area rug it runs slower, you can place towels under it to create L-R breaks. if you putt on a hard surface the balls bounce out of the lower holes easily sometimes the middle hole too. a towel under the holes helps prevent it from happening.
customer_reviews.author: MCano

customer_reviews.title: Poor product.
customer_reviews.text: This is not what I had in mind when I saw the picture. It's cheap and doesn't lay flat no matter how long or what you attempt to put on it to flatten it. Poor product.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Whalley

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: This putting mat is pretty good, particularly for the money. Some of the holes are so shallow that they don’t really catch the ball every time, but the effect is there. It is built on a very lightweight foam, not rubber like some of the others on the market, so it does tend to slide around and wrinkle.
customer_reviews.author: Bearden

customer_reviews.title: Fun family entertainment.
customer_reviews.text: My husband took the padding off the back and we actually have this in our front room. Putters stand at ready for competition. It was worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: RRobb

customer_reviews.title: Great Putting Trainer
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. It's easy to set up, it lies perfectly flat and provides a challenge to your putting. I live in Upper Michigan and we can only golf here for 5-6 months a year. So it is nice to get some putting practice in the winter. My dog also likes it. He thinks it's his new bed.
customer_reviews.author: mrb

customer_reviews.title: Awesome gift for teenagers that golf
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my niece’s 14th birthday. She is in the all star golf team here where we live, and she and her friends thought it was the coolest gift :-) I wasn’t sure if this was silly for someone who actually golfs very well, but she loved it and I was called the cool aunt lol
customer_reviews.author: Terrie Y.

customer_reviews.title: BUY THIS MAT BEFORE SPENDING $100s ON OTHER ONES!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is well worth the $40 it costs. Goes perfect in my basement. I only gave 4/5 stars for this because A. It’s not 9’, it’s only about 8-1/2’ and B. It’s a little monotonous. I’m still glad I bought this product over the $250-$400 ones. I recommend this product for someone, who like me, was indecisive about which putting green to get. Worst case is if you don’t end up liking it then your only out $40 and then you know to invest in a much more expensive one.
customer_reviews.author: Martin Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Kids and adults love it.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 7 year old and he wakes up early to putt every day before school. I thought at best it would be something to do while drinking as adults...but the reception by the kids has been awesome. They really love it. You aren't going to become a tour putter using it, but it can definitely help you lock in a nice tempo and alignment of putter face.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: nice training aid
customer_reviews.text: great little product. well-made, holes are deep enough to stop the balls, the cut-outs at the top prevent over-hits from rolling off the mat and under furniture. good tool to work on your stroke and the basics of alignment and keeping the club face square. helpful for improving consistency on making those short five footers. would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: ruggermel

customer_reviews.title: REALLY IMPRESSED
customer_reviews.text: I was really surprised that I didn't have to let it lay on the floor for a day to get the memory out. I roll it out and it's perfect. Can lay it out when I'm watching TV and practice my putting then roll it up and put it away when I"m done! Keeps the wife happy and the cats don't tear it up sharpening their claws. :)
customer_reviews.author: RShaunSmith

customer_reviews.title: Family fun and game improver
customer_reviews.text: We have this putting green in our family room. So much fun to work on putting stroke while watching tv. It doesn’t take up a lot of room. Try out different putters, grips, hand positions and your stroke. Then take it to the course. Good chance you will see improvement.
customer_reviews.author: Crayon

customer_reviews.title: Why not
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my man cave , it's very nice. I always used to just putt on the carpet/ kinda boring. But This Definitely makes it more fun to sink a few. If you like golf it's a good buy that will last for many years. Confidence in putting frees up ur golf swing...
customer_reviews.author: Michael S

customer_reviews.title: It’s Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Amazing quality for the price. It looks great. If you’re debating what to order, pick this one and you will Definitely be happy.
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: Perfect mat for my husband
customer_reviews.text: Perfect mat for my husband. He loves to golf and practice putting. He puts it on the carpet and the wood floor. On the hard floor, it goes faster and straighter, the carpet makes it difficult and harder for him. Super easy to roll up and put away when finished. Definitely recommend for a golf lover!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Easy setup, great for practice
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this. He has been talking about missing golf so this gives him a chance to at least practice putting. His only complaint is that he wishes the cups were a bit deeper as the ball easily falls out rather than going in. But other than that, he loves it. Super easy to set up so he takes it everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Working Mom

customer_reviews.title: Son loves it, incline is not gradual
customer_reviews.text: My son is 11 and doesn't care that the incline on this putting green is not gradual. It's very bare bones but he loves it. Only had it a few days. Don't know how it will hold up. Keeping the box for storage as suggested by other reviews.
customer_reviews.author: 79stek

customer_reviews.title: Great Practice Green
customer_reviews.text: This is a great practice tool. However, you have to remember that when you are out on a real golf course, grass reacts somewhat differently. This practice green has improved my aim and speed. I have had very few 3-putts since purchasing this. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne Patterson

customer_reviews.title: Thin and wrinkles
customer_reviews.text: The putting mat is very thin and flimsy. It wrinkles laid out flat on the carpet. It was inexpensive so I guess you get what you pay for. Definitely wouldn’t buy it again. Instead I plan to invest in a better heavier and thicker mat to practice my putting
customer_reviews.author: Maljan

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Great Christmas gift for my brother. Inexpensive but is holding up well. He is an avid golfer and says it is actually useful for practicing putts during the cold winter months. It is kind of thin, so if you were rolling/folding it up frequently, it may get creases in it. I would recommend just lightly rolling it if you need to move or store it.
customer_reviews.author: Erika

customer_reviews.title: This was pretty thin I never could get it to sit properly ...
customer_reviews.text: This was pretty thin I never could get it to sit properly to the floor. It was used once or twice and now is in the garage collecting dust. You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Tina L.

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: My friends and I had so much fun drinking and making up games to play with the putting green the other night I had to give it five stars. I also putt probably 50 balls a day in my office since I got it. It’s a great, quick little change of pace during my workday. I would love to get one of the very nice, more expensive putting greens, but I’ll say for $37 this has been a great product for me
customer_reviews.author: Riley B

customer_reviews.title: Great present!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a birthday present for my boyfriend and he loved it!! It was so easy to set up and easy to store. It was actually a really fun gift because it's like having a mini golf hole in your house. It's a great size and a very high quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah E

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Great starter putting green for my kids & I. They actually enjoy putting now, so this was a great investment. As an added bonus, my short game has improved too. It's a great family activity too! Nothing like a friendly competition to motivate our game.
customer_reviews.author: Jonnie

customer_reviews.title: Options are great
customer_reviews.text: Having three holes allows you to use numerous angles. Most all over shots are caught by the 2 back catches. I don't play golf regularly but had one of those one hole straight shots.. that gets boring and does not increase putting in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Percy C.

customer_reviews.title: Smooth and very fast
customer_reviews.text: This green is much smoother and faster than my old one. It's also long enough for a nice 8-9 foot putt. Because of the speed, you must concentrate more on a good line and stroke. My only complaint is that the holes are so shallow, a good putt will right through and out the back. In my opinion, that punishes some good putts and starts making my stroke softer and more tentative, not good. So it's great for super fast greens, but not aggressive putting. Overall, it's a great product. I bought a second one for a friend.
customer_reviews.author: SteveTop Contributor: Golf

customer_reviews.title: I wish I could exchange it for a better one
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could exchange this for a better one. This one has very little incline where the holes are & nothing to catch the ball. It's flimsy. you definitely get what you pay for. The actual description online does not indicate the depth of the incline. Bummer.
customer_reviews.author: Zlee63

customer_reviews.title: Great quality mat!
customer_reviews.text: Great mat! Don't buy any other one. Great quality and durable mat. Has no-slip backing and is relatively thick compared to other mats.
customer_reviews.author: THE Kyle Burden

customer_reviews.title: If you use it, you will putt better.
customer_reviews.text: Used this almost everyday, hitting a couple dozen putts, sometimes twice a day, my putting on the course has improved. I play 100 rounds/yr, 8 hdcp. Convenience is the key. It's in my cave all the time ready to use and that makes it easy. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great for just having fun
customer_reviews.text: An awesome mat for just having fun! It was smooth, soft, and a great size. It rolled out almost completely flat. We did have to weigh down one side of it for a few minutes to flatten it a little, but it worked great then. It also rolled up into the box again for storage well. The “hill” end, with the foam, wasn’t as high as we expected. It was much flatter. But still a challenge and still fun!
customer_reviews.author: Lexi Lofland

customer_reviews.title: So a good value. Green is a little slow compared to ...
customer_reviews.text: About what you'd expect for ~$30. Nothing special, but what I was looking for. So a good value. Green is a little slow compared to greens around here. I live in a desert area so greens around here are pretty fast.
customer_reviews.author: psujf

customer_reviews.title: Great practice tool
customer_reviews.text: Works great, decent green speed for practice. Word of advice - don't forget to take your putter with you when you go to play real golf! Happened to me after practicing all winter...
customer_reviews.author: Sportsman

customer_reviews.title: Extremely Pleased
customer_reviews.text: Extremely happy with this. Stays flat, does not move or bubble. I even got my grandson who is disinterested in golf hooked on putting. He even plays a game with points with his cousin. I might add though, it does nothing to help ones putting stroke which can perfect bad habits.
customer_reviews.author: JAFAA

customer_reviews.title: Great practice tool for the hardest part of golf!
customer_reviews.text: Got this as an a used - acceptable item and it was in great shape! I rolled it out and let the wrinkles settle out overnight. It's a great thing to practice putting as it is the worst part of my game right now. I keep it rolled out next to my gold simulator
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Love these mats
customer_reviews.text: Have given six as gifts. All the golfers in my life love these. Just bought another as a Christmas gift. Just love these.
customer_reviews.author: Gemlady

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love the putting green
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love the putting green. Was a great surprise for my hubby. Easy to roll out without any creases or lumps/bumps. Material and foam was better quality than I expected! When he walked into the room to see this putting green, he thought it was really neat. I saw the other reviewer setting up a black light and I think we will try that too!
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Practical way to practice putting in doors for a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.text: Nice size and can be used on carpet or hard flooring. Always lays flat even after being rolled for storage. Deeper holes with the eyebrow cuts make it more difficult to over shoot the end. Great way to practice putting during the winter months while watching TV.
customer_reviews.author: R. G. Lund

customer_reviews.title: Great item for daily practice
customer_reviews.text: This product has held up well and is just the right size for my small home office. Handy for some quick practice and it's already helped my putting game since i got it a few months ago. It's a home run for the price. I put some tick marks every 12" with a marker to help me gauge distances, the more expensive versions have that but this was a cheap quick way to do the same thing. I liked it so much i bought one for a buddy. highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Rolls out flat
customer_reviews.text: The reviews were right this does roll out flat. Bought this as a fathers day gift and the man was happy. Unfortunately for me he likes it so much its a permanent fixture in the Living room, he calls it his putt putt course.
customer_reviews.author: KELLY HINSON

customer_reviews.title: Very fast green but wrinkle all over.
customer_reviews.text: Very fast green. Very thin, large, Lightweight and practical design. Great buy for the money. The 3 stars is because of the wrinkles that are at the edge and near the wholes make bumps that interferes with the ball path.
customer_reviews.author: ksj

customer_reviews.title: Nice putting mat
customer_reviews.text: A bit flimisy but overall a good training tool. With some degree of care, it should last a good while. Takes some time for the bulges from being rolled up to disappear, but that's not really a quality issue. Good putting mat for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Ken WTop Contributor: Golf

customer_reviews.title: The boys loved every minute playing with it!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this on the fly after learning that it would rain the night we agree to let our 11 year old son have some friends over. Best thing we did all night (also bought the bucket of foam balls and foam/plastic golf putters for indoor use. The boys loved every minute of it.
customer_reviews.author: TXchica

product_meta.title: Putt-A-Bout Grassroots Par Three Putting Green (9-feet x 3-feet)
product_meta.description:
A great practice aid for your putting stroke. 9' x 3' Kidney shaped green gives you 3 cups to aim at. High quality putting surface designed to stay smooth.

AMAZON.COM
Hone your putting skills with this fun 3-by-9-foot putting green. The kidney-shaped green's three cups give you plenty of practice targets, while the built-in sand traps are designed to catch missed shots. The green also offers a high-quality putting surface designed to stay smooth over time.
feature_bullets: High quality putting surface stays smooth
Built in sand trap cutouts catch missed shots

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
